text: Wisdom teeth are out and I am surprisingly not in any pain! Did find out I CAN NOT take hydrocodine, it makes me sick and sleepy, but did find out being put under is weird and I repeat myself a lot when coming out of it! In love with Collin way more since he took care of me!
